snippet: The Yankees will need to do what only three other teams have been able to do in postseason history: lose the first two games of a best-of-seven series at home and still come back to win it.
abstract: New York Yankees will try to comeback from a 2-0 deficit when team faces Detroit Tigers in Game 3 of the American League championship series; only three baseball teams in postseason history have won a best-of-seven series after losing their first two games.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees will need to do what only three other teams have been able to do in postseason history: lose the first two games of a best-of-seven series at home and still come back to win it.

headline.seo: Few Teams Have Come Back From Playoff Hole Yankees Are In
headline.main: A Yankees Rally? Precedents Are Few but Memorable
headline.print_headline: A Yankees Rally? Precedents Are Few but Memorable
